gen:link.label:label: BV266_2: The item "Diversification between sub-modules" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the difference between "Health catastrophe risk" and the sum of all risks reported. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Columns: c0010;0030; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, r0340,cNNN}={SR.27.01, r0300,cNNN}-sum({SR.27.01, cNNN, (r0310-0330)})

BV266_2: The item "Diversification between sub-modules" reported in SR.27.01 - Solvency Capital Requirement - Non-life and Health catastrophe risk [RFF/MP/RM] should be equal to the difference between "Health catastrophe risk" and the sum of all risks reported. -->Template 1: SR.01.01; Template 2: SR.27.01; Columns: c0010;0030; Expression: If {SR.01.01, r0940,c0010}=Reported then {SR.27.01, r0340,cNNN}={SR.27.01, r0300,cNNN}-sum({SR.27.01, cNNN, (r0310-0330)})
